name: Alien Defense Unit
description:
Alien Defense Unit is a VR Tower Defense game where the player and his friends are all that protects their tower. Equip your combat suit with any combination of 10 abilities, swapping between them to best suit the needs of the current threat while your friends gather intel, set traps, and put up defenses to protect all you have left from the invading alien army.

-10 abilities & weapons
-8 loadout slots
-Up to 4 couch co-op players + 1 VR player
-Total Player Control, no hopping to predefined teleport locations
